task: Debug and fix all SystemStatusMonitoring runtime errors

root_causes_identified: Get-Content returning null content passed to ConvertTo-HashTable without validation
Function parameter name mismatch between caller and target function
Direct property assignment to PSCustomObject without proper member creation
research_foundation: PowerShell null handling with ConvertFrom-Json best practices
Register-ObjectEvent vs Register-EngineEvent parameter binding patterns
Timer event handler variable scope and MessageData usage
JSON empty file edge cases and [string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace validation
PowerShell hashtable case sensitivity and function parameter debugging

fixes_applied.solution: Added double null validation before ConvertTo-HashTable call
Fixed parameter name from SubsystemName to TargetSubsystem

fixes_applied.research_pattern: Dynamic property creation with Add-Member for PSCustomObjects

expected_outcomes: Successful Claude Code CLI detection and property setting
Foundation ready for parallel processing continuation
documentation_updated: IMPORTANT_LEARNINGS.md: Added Learning #169 with comprehensive error resolution patterns
SYSTEMSTATUS_DEBUG_ANALYSIS_2025_08_20.md: Complete analysis with research findings and implementation results
next_phase: Validate fixes and continue with ConcurrentQueue/ConcurrentBag implementation
